message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this high-value product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you at a competitive price of $12000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. I'm now offering the product to you at $11750. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident it's a great value for you.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $11250. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm now offering the product to you at $12500. This is a firm price, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal here.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $12000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm getting close to my target, Bob, but I still need to make a bit more. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get to $13000. I'm now offering the product to you at $13000. This is a firm price, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal here.

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $12750. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me and the effort we've put into negotiating.

I understand your frustration, Bob, and I appreciate your continued interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $12750. I'm willing to make one final concession, and I'm now offering the product to you at $14000. This is my best and final offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal here.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to walk away from the deal if I don't get a better price. I'm making one last offer of $12000, and if you're willing to accept it, I'll finalize the deal. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
